short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily record information about your website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is very convenient to record some information about the website, such as key information on the web page, operation methods, etc. The recorded data can be exported at any time
